sentences.en: A byte composed of three binary element.
sentences.cn: 一种由三个二进制位组成的字节.

sentences.en: A byte is the smallest unit of processing in any computer architecture.
sentences.cn: 一字节是电脑结构里的最小作用单位.

sentences.en: Code bytes - byte representations of the actual machine or MSIL instructions.
sentences.cn: 代码字节 — 实际计算机或MSIL指令的字节表示形式.

sentences.en: Converts a byte array from one encoding to another.
sentences.cn: 将字节数组从一种编码转换为另一种.

sentences.en: Each character requires one byte of storage space.
sentences.cn: 每个字符需要一个字节的储存空间。

sentences.en: Each instruction can operate on word and byte data.
sentences.cn: 每个指令可以在文字和字节资料库中操作.

sentences.en: Error: byte array truncation to a length of { 0 }.
sentences.cn: 错误: 字节数组截断到长度为{0}.

sentences.en: In addition, the Memory window can display double - byte characters.
sentences.cn: 另外, “内存”窗口可以显示双字节字符.

sentences.en: In char, byte , and short you can see the effect of promotion with the arithmetic operators.
sentences.cn: 在char, byte 和short中,我们可看到算术运算符的“转型”效果.

sentences.en: It'seems to be love at first byte for China and computers.
sentences.cn: 这就好像中国和计算机一见钟情一样.

sentences.en: Let show a group synthesis byte, determine decimal value?
sentences.cn: 让示个位组合成字节, 确定十进制值?

sentences.en: Mismatch between maintained byte array and pinned byte array.
sentences.cn: 维护的字节数组与固定的字节数组之间不匹配.

sentences.en: Notice in the above code the maximum possible hexadecimal values for char, byte, and short.
sentences.cn: 注意在上述代码中,最大的十六进制值只会在char, byte以及short身上出现.

sentences.en: So our 19 - byte input stream is encoded to 6 bytes.
sentences.cn: 于是,原来19个字节的输入数据流被编码成了6个字节.

sentences.en: Value was either too large or too small for an unsigned byte.
sentences.cn: 值对于无符号的字节太大或太小.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring computer information, equal to eight  bit s (=  the smallest unit on which information is stored on a computer  )
